attributes.action: lower fuel prices below £1 per litre - reduce the tax percentage and stop massive profits at the pump
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the proposed union action in Grangemouth, some filling stations have increased the prices at the pumps to profit from others misfortunes.  This is intollorable and the public should not have to accept this from a party they voted to action the voters best interests.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "lower fuel prices below £1 per litre - reduce the tax percentage and stop massive profits at the pump."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19854


Prime Minister's Office
